sentences.english: Do not be hasty when climbing, sit for a while if you get tired.
sentences.chinese: 登山的时候不能急，累了就小坐片刻。

sentences.english: Expensive into mom to take care of small into also very tired, she fell asleep sitting there.
sentences.chinese: 贵成妈为照顾小成也很累，她坐在那里就睡着了。

sentences.english: Really feel very tired now, very tired, but all have no.
sentences.chinese: 现在真的觉得好累，好累，可是都没有。

sentences.english: Really feel very tired now, very tired, but all have no.
sentences.chinese: 现在真的觉得好累，好累，可是都没有。

sentences.english: He drove the workers until they collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 他迫使工人们干得一个个累趴在地。

sentences.english: But the little squirrel too tired to say a word.
sentences.chinese: 可是小松鼠累得说不出一句话来了。

sentences.english: I proposed that we should all go and eat ices in the park.
sentences.chinese: 我们都又热又累，我提议一起到公园去吃一点冷食。

sentences.english: For I'm wearied wi hunting, and fain wad lie down.
sentences.chinese: 我打完猎好累，快让我躺下。

sentences.english: I was so tired that I fell asleep.
My legs were tired with jumping and my face burned.
sentences.chinese: 我的双腿蹦得累极了，脸也冻得火辣辣的。

sentences.english: I was tired after shoveling snow all day.
sentences.chinese: 铲了一天的雪我很累了。

sentences.english: At night, LJ is tucked against a wall, cold and tired.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，LJ隐藏在一堵墙后，感到又冷又累。

sentences.english: It's late at night and you're tired.
sentences.chinese: 天色已晚而且你也累了。

sentences.english: I am too tired and sleepy to open my eyes now.
sentences.chinese: 现在感觉又累又瞌睡，眼睛都睁不不开了。

sentences.english: My horse is dead beat , and I can't get him no further than the stable.
sentences.chinese: 我的马太累了，我不能把它赶到比马房更远的地方。

definition: exhausting/hard/tough/arduous/to work hard/to go to a lot of trouble/hardship(s)
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear

to collapse/to be worn out/to break down
to tire oneself out through overwork/to work oneself to death
